replies.body:
Lol isn't Jimmy Wong from RockectJump?
I remember him acting in VGHS

It's a shame you can't report these scam-advertising comments and get them removed... Voting them down enough to get them below the viewable {{champion:412}}hold is one thing, but I'd just rather have them removed completely, tbh.

One time a Hiemerdinger player kept insulting me and bad mouthing me it was so annoying and since i have a short temper I punched the table too. i cant believe some people are like this it just makes me sick, don't make me feel like a piece of worthless shit so you don't have to use skill to defeat me.
{{item:3151}}
Damn that chick's a stunner! What's her hourly rate? ;){{champion:21}}
Hahaha I love these guys they're great xD
I never kill afk/dc that's just sad, always wait till they come back, what's the point of playing a game if you're not using skill to win.
Some Asian on Asian violence going on here..{{champion:32}}
Man I wish i had money to go to Europe :/
